node.doctext:
Catagories: Possible | Incomplete | Worthless | Used | Uncategorized

Possible

These ideas look good.

Incomplete

These ideas lack the choices or are otherwise incomplete.

Worthless

These ideas suck.

Used

These ideas have been already used.

Uncategorized

These ideas are not yet categorized. Includes all responses to the quest through 05 September 2005.
